# Mechanism

:::{.callout title="Claim by gary brekka"}

S-adenosyl-L-methionine (SAMe) is a methylation aide and that is why it helps with sleep since it augments the body's ability to methylate neurotransmitters that keep one awake/prevent one from sleeping.

:::



# Sleep

:::{.callout title="Claim by gary brekka"}

S-adenosyl-L-methionine (SAMe) are all supplements considered to improve sleep.
These are not *sleep* aids, they are in fact *methylation* aids that improve the body's ability to breakdown the neurotransmitters that keep you in the wakened state

:::
